instructions.de: Leicht links weiter auf Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.en: Make a slight left to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Continúe ligeramente a la izquierda en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Continuer légèrement à gauche sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kiri ke Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.it: Continua leggermente a sinistra per stare su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Kontynuuj łagodnie w lewo na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Continue ligeiramente à esquerda em Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните налево на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Fortsätt åt vänster in på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь плавно ліворуч на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên trái vào Cool highway (Ref1)
